name: Single Room
description: One room, often shared bathroom/kitchen, cheapest option for students or workers.

name: Self-Contained Room
description: One room with private bathroom and sometimes small kitchen.

name: Studio
description: Single room combining sleeping, living, and sometimes kitchenette; fully self-contained.

name: Mini Flat
description: Small 1-bedroom apartment with living area, kitchen, and bathroom.

name: Room and Parlour
description: 1 bedroom + living room + bathroom + kitchen.

name: 2-Bedroom Apartment
description: Two bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom(s); for small families.

name: 3-Bedroom Apartment
description: Three bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom(s); for medium-sized families.

name: 4-Bedroom Apartment
description: Four bedrooms, living room, kitchen, multiple bathrooms; for larger families.

name: Duplex
description: Two-level house with bedrooms upstairs, living/kitchen downstairs.

name: Triplex
description: Three-level house, larger family or multi-tenant use.

name: Bungalow
description: Single-story detached house, usually with a yard.

name: Villa
description: Spacious, luxurious standalone house with compound, garden, sometimes swimming pool.

name: Penthouse
description: Luxury top-floor apartment in a multi-storey building, with terrace or panoramic views.

name: Furnished Apartment
description: Fully equipped with furniture and appliances; for professionals or short-term rentals.

name: Guest House
description: Multiple rooms for visitors or tourists, may include services like breakfast or cleaning.

name: Serviced Apartment
description: Apartment rented fully furnished with services such as cleaning, security, utilities included.

name: Mud House
description: Simple construction using local materials, more common in peri-urban or rural areas.

name: Earth Block House
description: Modern adaptation of traditional mud house using stabilized earth blocks.

name: Thatched Hut
description: Traditional round huts with thatch roofing, mostly in northern and rural areas.

name: Bamboo House
description: Constructed using bamboo, often in suburban/peri-urban areas.

name: Office Space
description: Commercial rental space for businesses, startups, or small companies; may include private washrooms, parking, and reception areas.
